resources.string:
"

Ramayan Hindi - (रामायण) Ramanand Sagar' Apps Privacy Policy

We, at Hindi respect your privacy. We don't collect, use, store and disclose the personal identifying data and information of any User of Ramayana (App).

What data is collected

User is able to use the App anonymously. We may collect some Non-personal identification information for technical purposes.

The used and collected data include:

  • Your IP address &
  • Data about your operating system and browser

How we use User's information

We use the Non-personal identification information for technical and analytics purpose. And we use the personal identification information only to enhance the User experience of the App.

Security and data share

We are committed to protect your information and we undertake to take all reasonable steps in order to protect the security of your information. We do not sell, trade, or rent User's personal identification information to others. We do not share your personal information except as approved by you.

Changes to this privacy policy

The privacy policy and this page content may change over time. We will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page each time we perform an update.

Contacting us

If you have any question about this Policy please contact us.

This document was last updated on July 6, 2019

"

app does not stream any of the channels included in its website/app. All the streaming links are from third parties available free on the internet. We are not responsible for its contents. If any one found that we are violating by broadcasting any copyright protected channel. please email us at
with the channel name, we will remove that channel from this app.
